checks.details: Can't find end of central directory : is this a zip file ? If it is, see http://stuk.github.io/jszip/documentation/howto/read_zip.html
checks.description: The bundle should be a valid zip file
The bundle should contain an index.html file at the root
The game should start without error
The game should not load external http resources
The game should display something on the screen
